room_title: Escape room "The Long Lost Pharaoh" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
room_description:
You and your friends are a set of explorers looking for your next adventure. You stumble upon an old Egyptian myth of a long-lost pharaoh that was buried with his treasure. It is said that if his tomb is disturbed evil will be released into the world. You and your friends decide to investigate if this story is true. 

As you and your friends enter the long-lost pharaohâ€™s temple evil is released. You must stop it. You must find the three relics of power. They are hidden inside the temple, guarded by ancient mechanisms. Remember, if you fail, all evil will be release into the world. Hurry and Good Luck.
